lead_paragraph: SIDEL--Ruth (Grossman), of New York, NY on Thursday, May 12, 2016. For 60 years, the loving wife of Dr. Victor W. Sidel. Cherished mother of Mark Sidel and his wife Margaret Raymond and Kevin Sidel and his wife Inge. Loving grandmother of Andrew, Rosemary and Theodora. Beloved sister of the late Jerome and Edgar Grossman. Ruth Sidel was Professor of Sociology at Hunter College from 1978-2012. She is the author of numerous books and articles about the impact of poverty on women and children and the need for a comprehensive U.S. family policy and lectured worldwide on these issues. Graveside services at Temple Ohabei Shalom Cemetery, 147 Wordsworth Street, East Boston, MA on Friday, May 20, 2016 at 11:00am. In lieu of flowers, remembrances may be made to The Research Foundation of CUNY for WRI (Welfare Rights Initiative), Hunter College, 695 Park Avenue, New York, NY 10065. 1/3
